sentences.sContent: The choice of emollient should be made taking into account budgetary limitations and ease of supply.
sentences.sContent_eng: The choice of emollient should be made taking into account budgetary limitations and ease of supply.
sentences.sCn: 选择润肤剂应考虑到预算的多少，以及是否容易供应。

remMethod.val: e + moll ( = soft， 软) + ient → 使肌肤变柔软的东西 → 润肤剂

trans.tranOther: An emollient is a liquid or cream that you put on your skin to make it softer or to reduce pain
making someone feel calmer when they have been angry
